description: Refugees and displaced persons in the Democratic Republic of Congo and neighboring countries due to ongoing conflict and humanitarian crises

targets.name: Eastern Congo IDPs
targets.description: Internally displaced persons in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo due to ongoing armed conflict
targets.intention: May all internally displaced persons in eastern Congo find safety, shelter, and the opportunity to return home in peace

targets.name: Congolese Child Refugees
targets.description: Children who have been displaced or become refugees due to conflict in Congo, including unaccompanied minors
targets.intention: May all Congolese child refugees find protection, education, and the chance to experience a normal childhood

additional_data.estimated_count: Hundreds of thousands of children affected

targets.name: Congolese Women Refugees
targets.description: Women who have fled conflict in Congo, many of whom are survivors of sexual violence and gender-based persecution
targets.intention: May all Congolese women refugees find safety, healing from trauma, and opportunities for empowerment

targets.name: Congolese Refugees in Uganda
targets.description: Congolese refugees living in refugee settlements in Uganda, one of the largest host countries
targets.intention: May all Congolese refugees in Uganda find welcome, support, and opportunities for rebuilding their lives

data_sources: Ugandan Office of the Prime Minister

targets.name: Congolese Refugees in Rwanda
targets.description: Congolese refugees in Rwanda, including long-term refugees and recent arrivals due to renewed conflict
targets.intention: May all Congolese refugees in Rwanda find safety, dignity, and pathways to lasting solutions

targets.name: Congolese Refugees in Burundi
targets.description: Congolese refugees who have fled to Burundi to escape conflict and persecution
targets.intention: May all Congolese refugees in Burundi find safety and support, may their basic needs be met

targets.name: Disabled Congolese Refugees
targets.description: Refugees with disabilities who have fled conflict in Congo, facing additional barriers and challenges
targets.intention: May all disabled Congolese refugees find accessible services, dignity, and specialized support

targets.name: Elderly Congolese Refugees
targets.description: Elderly people who have been displaced from their homes in Congo, often with specific health and care needs
targets.intention: May all elderly Congolese refugees find comfort, appropriate healthcare, and respect for their wisdom and experience

targets.name: Congolese Urban Refugees
targets.description: Congolese refugees living in urban areas rather than formal camps, often with limited access to services
targets.intention: May all Congolese urban refugees find community, support networks, and opportunities for self-reliance

targets.name: Returnee Congolese Refugees
targets.description: Congolese refugees attempting to return home but facing challenges of reintegration and continued insecurity
targets.intention: May all returning Congolese refugees find safety in their home communities, may their reintegration be successful
